text: La Maddalena (A Madalèna, Sa Madalèna) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sassari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 11,246 people lived there. Its area is 52.01 km². It is 19 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of Sassari
title: La Maddalena
